label: uncl8395
comment: Code specifying the responsibility for the freight payment for a returnable package.

values.label: Paid by customer
values.comment: The freight charges involved with returning of the packaging are to be paid by the customer.

values.label: Free
values.comment: There is no charge for the freight of returning the packaging.

values.label: Paid by supplier
values.comment: The responsibility for the freight for returning the packaging is to be paid by the supplier.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: A code assigned within a code list to be used on an interim basis and as defined among trading partners until a precise code can be assigned to the code list.
